wikipedia_page.main: Albert H. Johnson (1 May 1931 – 20 May 2011) was a British racewalker. He competed in the men's 50 kilometres walk at the 1956 Summer Olympics and the 1960 Summer Olympics.

response: *Albert Johnson (New Mexico politician) (died 1984), mayor of Las Cruces, New Mexico
